text: Yeah, this was always painful, but I didnâ€™t realize how much so until I received a task yesterday to replace hundreds of links on hundreds of pages, on a website with thousands of pages and redirects. I also realized that it seemed basically impossible to find the page when the title is fairly short and common, I entered the exact page title and scrolled hundreds through the list before giving up on a few of them.
We even use external links and drop the full URL there instead of using "One of your pages"
